verbs.description: [V: report] [ARG1: details] how furious aaron rodgers was with ty montgomery the green bay packers were in excellent position to hand the los angeles rams their first loss of the season on sunday but an inexplicable error by running back ty montgomery resulted in them handing the game away it was clear aaron rodgers was furious by the way he reacted but it fair to wonder if montgomery will ever be forgiven by his teammates the rams had kicked a field goal to go up 29 - 27 and were kicking off with 2 05 remaining in los angeles rams green bay st louis rams fox nfl com rams ty montgomery michael silver green bay packers green bay wisconsin aaron rodgers
